code: @Manual{,   title = {shrthnd: Work with data that uses shorthand and symbols},   author = {Matt Kerlogue},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/mattkerlogue/shrthnd, https://mattkerlogue.github.io/shrthnd/}, }

what: Work with data that uses shorthand and symbols
title: Work with data that uses shorthand and symbols
text: Data often published shorthand symbols, regularly markers found container value. aim shrthnd process character vectors numerical data contain non-numeric shorthand symbols.

title: Work with data that uses shorthand and symbols
text: can install development version shrthnd like :

title: Work with data that uses shorthand and symbols
code: library(shrthnd) x <- c("12", "34.567", "[c]", "NA", "56.78[e]", "78.9", "90.123[e]") sh_x <- shrthnd_num(x, shorthand = c("[c]", "[e]"), na_values = "NA", digits = 2) shrthnd_list(sh_x) #> <shrthnd_list[2]>  #> [c] (1 location): 3  #> [e] (2 locations): 5, 7 tibble::tibble(sh_x = sh_x, as_num = as.numeric(sh_x),                 as_char = as.character(sh_x), tag = shrthnd_tags(sh_x),                 as_shrthnd = as_shrthnd(sh_x),                 as_shrthnd2 = as_shrthnd(sh_x, digits = FALSE)) #> # A tibble: 7 × 6 #>       sh_x as_num as_char tag   as_shrthnd as_shrthnd2 #>   <sh_dbl>  <dbl> <chr>   <chr> <chr>      <chr>       #> 1    12.00   12   12      <NA>  12.00      12          #> 2    34.57   34.6 34.567  <NA>  34.57      34          #> 3      [c]   NA   <NA>    [c]   [c]        [c]         #> 4       NA   NA   <NA>    <NA>  <NA>       <NA>        #> 5 56.78[e]   56.8 56.78   [e]   56.78[e]   56[e]       #> 6    78.90   78.9 78.9    <NA>  78.90      78          #> 7 90.12[e]   90.1 90.123  [e]   90.12[e]   90[e]

title: Coerce a shrthnd_num to a character vector with shorthand — as_shrthnd
text: calling .character() shrthnd_num() output expect calling traditional numeric vector, as_shrthnd() returns character vector combining numeric vector shorthand tags.

title: Coerce a shrthnd_num to a character vector with shorthand — as_shrthnd
shrthnd predicates — is_shrthnd_num
text: is_shrthnd_* family functions test whether vector either shrthnd_num(), shrthnd_integer(), shrthnd_double() shrthnd_list()

title: shrthnd predicates — is_shrthnd_num
shrthnd predicates — is_shrthnd_num
text: x shrthnd object

title: shrthnd predicates — is_shrthnd_num
text: logical vector

title: shrthnd predicates — is_shrthnd_num
code: x <- c("12", "34.567", "[c]", "NA", "56.78[e]", "78.9", "90.123[e]") sh_x <- shrthnd_num(x, c("[c]", "[e]")) is_shrthnd_num(sh_x) #> [1] TRUE is_shrthnd_double(sh_x) #> [1] TRUE  y <- c("12", "34", "[c]", "NA", "56[e]", "78", "90[e]") sh_y <- shrthnd_num(y, c("[c]", "[e]")) is_shrthnd_num(sh_y) #> [1] TRUE is_shrthnd_integer(sh_y) #> [1] TRUE  sh_l <- shrthnd_list(sh_x) is_shrthnd_list(sh_l) #> [1] TRUE

what: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
text: shrthnd_num() coerces character vector containing numeric data values non-numeric markers numeric vector also retaining markers.

title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
code: shrthnd_num(   x,   shorthand = NULL,   na_values = "NA",   digits = 2L,   paren_nums = c("negative", "strip") )

title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
text: x character vector numeric values shorthand shorthand character vector shorthand values na_values character vector NA values digits number digits formatting numbers paren_nums handle numbers parenthesis (e.g. (12,435.43)), defaults negative commonly used accounting denote negative values instead minus symbol preceding value

title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
text: shrthnd_num vector

title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num
text: Data stored documents publications regularly annotated shorthand symbols. Often markers found container (e.g. table spreadsheet cell) value associated , requires cleaning vector extract numeric values. simple approach discard non-numeric components, however markers convey information may wish retain. shrthnd_num() provides data type can store numeric data marker

title: Process a character vector containing shorthand — shrthnd_num

what: Get the tags attached to a shrthnd vector — shrthnd_tags
title: Get the tags attached to a shrthnd vector — shrthnd_tags
text: shrthnd_tags() provides character vector length x shorthand tags, NA value tag. shrthnd_tags_unique() convenience wrapper unique(shrthnd_tags(x)), can also called shrthnd_list() object.
